abstract:
Outputs empty tags in HTML without a close tag, such as `
`.
rawMarkdown:
--- source: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/Foundation/XMLDocument/ContentKind/html crawled: 2025-12-07T12:00:09Z --- # XMLDocument.ContentKind.html **Case** Outputs empty tags in HTML without a close tag, such as `
`. ## Declaration ```swift case html ``` ## Enumeration Cases - **XMLDocument.ContentKind.text**: Outputs the string value of the document by extracting the string values from all text nodes. - **XMLDocument.ContentKind.xhtml**: The document output is XHTML. - **XMLDocument.ContentKind.xml**: The default type of document content type, which is XML.

items.description: Outputs the string value of the document by extracting the string values from all text nodes.
